summary: This bill, the Undetectable Firearms Modernization Act, aims to update the 1988 Undetectable Firearms Act. It modifies the definition of detectable firearms, focusing on detectability by metal detectors and airport security screening devices. It redefines "major component" of a firearm and modifies the definition of "detectable material." The bill also clarifies exemptions for firearms used by the United States and licensed manufacturers/importers with existing contracts.
